name: Save The World! (Quadratic Games)
description:
Save The World!

This game was made in maybe 3 hours for Trijam #111 in Godot Engine by Filip Novotný.

It was quite fun to make everything from triangles :D

Controls: WAD keys or arrows

The music is my own song I composed few months ago in Bandpass. 

Triangle texture made in Figma.

Maybe the sound is distorted :(  I just have no idea what it can be caused by... Try your luck, maybe you'll be without any problems. 

Edit: It's distorted only in the last version of Chrome, other browsers should be fine.
